title: Shinsotsu Nanafushigi
sinopse:
Here come the three newly graduated recruits, and they've been hired at this small-time company, "Food Containers, Enshu Branch!" They're cool, but they'll make you sweat! They're laid-back, but they're passionate! You've gotta check out this 4-koma about the working life of adults in business!

(Source: MU)
